instructions:
Cream butter and sugar. Add beaten eggs and vanilla. Add sifted flour, salt and baking powder. Drop
onto a 10 x 15 inch rimmed greased cookie sheet and spread with a knife about 3/8 inch thick. Cover with
following topping.

TOPPING
1 egg white
1/2 tsp vanilla
1 cup light brown sugar
3/4 cup chopped walnuts

Beat egg white until stiff. Continue beating while adding vanilla and sugar. Smooth over cookie batter
and sprinkle with chopped nuts. Bake in 350 F oven for 25 minutes. Cut into bars when cool.
name: Walnut Meringue Cookies
